name: CoinAbcCommonFactorization
brief: Common infrastructure for ABC SIMD-optimized factorization

algorithms.name:
ABC Factorization Infrastructure (LAPACK LU, Blocking)
Shared definitions, statistics tracking, and LAPACK interfaces for
ABC factorization variants. Provides:

- ABC_SMALL modes: Controls memory copies for factorization
  - -1: Force copies (no tests)
  - 0: Force copy of U
  - 2: Force no copies (no tests)

- CoinAbcStatistics: Tracks element counts through L, R, U phases
- CoinAbcStack: Stack structure for depth-first traversal
- CoinAbcDgetrf/Dgetrs: LAPACK-compatible LU routines (homegrown or external)

Blocking parameters for cache-friendly factorization:
- BLOCKING8: 8-element blocks for SIMD alignment
- SWAP_FACTOR: Controls swap threshold
